name: Product Defects
description: Failures caused by product defects or issues

name: Test Defects
description: Failures caused by test automation issues

name: Environment Issues
description: Failures caused by environment or infrastructure problems

name: Driver Issues
description: Failures caused by Appium driver or device issues

name: Configuration Issues
description: Failures caused by configuration or setup problems

name: Performance Issues
description: Tests that failed due to performance thresholds being exceeded

name: Data Issues
description: Failures caused by test data problems

name: UI Element Issues
description: Failures related to UI element interactions

name: Cart Operations
description: Failures related to shopping cart functionality

name: Product Operations
description: Failures related to product viewing and interaction

name: Navigation Issues
description: Failures related to app navigation and page transitions
